html:
⚡️ Differences in Lightning Network Wallets: Custodial vs Non-Custodial 🚀

🔑 Custodial Wallet: One-click login, no need to worry about private keys!
👍 Pros: Extremely convenient, ideal for beginners
⚠️ Cons: Security depends on third-party services, reduced control

— Bitlight Wallet (@Bitlight_wallet) November 29, 2023
